recipes.title: Whipped Carrots with Cranberries
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Place 2 in. of water in a small saucepan; add carrots. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until tender. Drain.                                                                                            Place carrots in a food processor; add the butter, brown sugar, ginger and salt. Cover and process until smooth. Transfer to a serving bowl; stir in cranberries.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Whipped Carrots with Cranberries in  Simple & DeliciousNovember/December 2007, p31                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1/3 cup equals 158 calories, 9 g fat (5 g saturated fat), 23 mg cholesterol, 288 mg sodium, 21 g carbohydrate, 4 g fiber, 1 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Place 2 in. of water in a small saucepan; add carrots. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until tender.
Place carrots in a food processor; add the butter, brown sugar, ginger and salt. Cover and process until smooth.
Transfer to a serving bowl; stir in cranberries.
